question:
You are going for a one week vacation and your friend agreed to stay at your place while you are away. Write a letter to him/her.


In your letter you should:
thank him/her and tell the dates of your holiday
explain how he/she enters the house
describe what you expect him/her to do
text: I am writing this letter to thank you for having my back, as I am going out on a holiday trip planned by my office in order to appreciate the dedication of my work.
To commence with, as you know I m going next month on the 7th which is Saturday and my trip ends on the 15th . I would like to appreciate your esteem and for taking care of my house in the meantime.

Additionally, I will give you basic information regarding the house. Firstly, you can find the keys to the house, next door his name is Dhruv . After entering the front yard , the key for the main door is kept in my garage which is open and on left. In addition , to access the bedroom you need a passcode which is 3572.

Apart from it, it is a request from me to feed the fish every evening, and the food is in the first drawer and to water the plants in the morning for that you just have to on the tap next to the garage.
Thank you in anticipation as it means a lot to next me.
